ygData.subject: Re: Swords
ygData.msgSnippet: ... weapons at those levels, since it is my understanding that ... and you have it listed as a 21-30 weapon.  Also, Dark ... it takes a party of low-40s to get
ygData.messageBody:
> First off, your weapon descriptions lead me to think that you are buying
weapons at those levels, since it is my understanding that
> a GZ isn't exactly easy to come by until about 35th level (with a group)
and you have it listed as a 21-30 weapon. Also, Dark
> Reavers are located in a very, very dangerous place, and I would imagine
it takes a party of low-40s to get it.
>
> Or is my view of things really skewed?

Yeah, we're talking buying/trading here. You can get a BIBS at about 25, and
usually most people trade their BIBS and about 500-700pp to upgrade to a
Zweihander. It happens a lot. As for a Dark Reaver, I got mine at 28 (paid
1000pp, demon claw, and liz cloak for it), and most SKs 30+ will already
have one. The reason they aren't as expensive as you would think is
*because* they are a class-specific weapon. When your customer base is made
up of only SKs ranging from 20-30, you can't really charge an arm and a leg
for one and make the sale, ya know?

> I'm guessing that the BBC is pretty much valueless -- seems that you can
get by with a Combine 2HS or SBH until you hit the level
> necessary for BIBS. Is there any real demand for the BBC?

Back in the day, I used a BBC for a *long* time, I'm talking from 18 to 28,
I never cared much for the BIBS, and any dark elf can spare 9 Agility like
its nothing. I don't see why the BBC is so undervalued -- if you can take
the Agi hit, it's better than the SBH and about the same price.

Dravith Vandre'i
Dark Elf SK (38)
Fennin Ro

PS: Btw, the other guy was right, Beld *knows* his shtuff! <g>
